author: andreas
content: Thanks. When I began, I wanted to do it for at least a year. Not that I had any intention to stop afterwards, but that was the lower limit that I had set for myself. Anything less and I would have felt like making a fool of myself. Five years later, I'm tired now and then and the posts come frequently in batches, but I still feel I can go on, and what's more important: It's still fun ðŸ™‚
